Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2015 11:33PM Wino wrote: Hi there. Question: I just finished 37 rads today and skin held up well until a couple of days ago. I started to peel but one area stuck to sports bra and a layer came off. Now using silvadene but every time I wear clothing or use a pad, it peels off again and is bleeding. Anyone else have this skin issue? How long for it to heal? Thank you for your help!
